question_In_what_year_was_the_programme_: In what year was the programme first broadcasted?
hint_In_what_year_was_the_programme_firs: DISCLAIMER: In relation to neighbouring or related rights (i.e. rights over performances, phonograms, the first fixation of a film and broadcast) the Public Domain Helper Tool only applies when at least one of the right-holders is a national of an EEA state. The European Economic Area (EEA) includes all member states of the European Union (EEA) includes all member states of the European Union (Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and the United Kingdom), as well as Iceland, Liechtenstein and Norway.
Was_the_programme_first_broadcasted_more: Was the programme first broadcasted more than 50 years ago?
LBL_4: The related right of the broadcasting organisation in this broadcast has expired. Please note that a single item might be protected by multiple layers of rights. You may need to apply the Public Domain Calculator again to examine whether additional rights apply, such as copyright protection in any underlying literary or artistic work, producers' rights in any relevant phonogram or performers' rights in any performance that may be fixated in such a phonogram.
LBL_5: The related right of the broadcasting organisation in this broadcast has not expired. Please contact the right- holder before use.
question_In_what_year_was_the_film_publi: In what year was the film published or communicated to the public?
hint_In_what_year_was_the_film_published: DISCLAIMER: In relation to neighbouring or related rights (i.e. rights over performances, phonograms, the first fixation of a film and broadcast) the Public Domain Helper Tool only applies when at least one of the right-holders is a national of an EEA state. The European Economic Area (EEA) includes all member states of the European Union (EEA) includes all member states of the European Union (Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and the United Kingdom), as well as Iceland, Liechtenstein and Norway.
question_Term_of_protection_fixation_of_: Term of protection fixation of film
Was_the_film_published_or_communicated_t: Was the film published or communicated to the public within 50 years from fixation?
Was the film published or communicated to the public more than 50 years ago?
LBL_12: The related right of the film producer in the first fixation of the film has expired. Please note that a single item might be protected by multiple layers of rights. You may need to apply the Public Domain Calculator again to examine whether additional rights apply, such as copyright protection in any cinematographic or audiovisual work which might be fixated in the film.
LBL_13: The related right of the producer of the film producer in the first fixation of the film has not expired. Please contact the right-holder before use.
question_In_what_year_was_the_film_first: In what year was the film first fixated?
hint_In_what_year_was_the_film_first_fix: The flowchart does not cover performances, phonograms and videograms that were not longer protected on 22 December 2002.
